Open Source Documentation

I can’t help creating open source documentation and some people claim I’m good at it.

Link to tweet

Why bother?

  • Documentation helps me reflect on the process
  • Documentation invites meaningful conversations
  • Documentation inspires other people to learn by doing

Win-Win-Win.

It’s all about sending ripples into the world - by showing the nitty gritty process of making stuff that matters.

💧

💧

💧

🌊

I operate in the gift economy. It would mean a lot to me if you would consider supporting my work financially - allowing me to dedicate more energy to sharing delightful documentation catalysing the transition towards a regenerative way of living on a personal and planetary level.

Here’s my Patreon.

If you’d like to fund a specific piece of documentation, let me know.

🌳

Handbooks 📖

  • Enspiral Handbook - documenting a global network helping people doing more stuff that matters.
  • Microsolidarity in Pico - a digital journal documenting the process of community weaving in Pico Island, by practicing Microsolidarity.
  • Traditional Dream Factory Handbook - documentation of the very first land-based DAO in Europe, the first prototype of a regenerative village in OASA Network
  • Digital Journal (inactive) - a digital journaling / personal development documentation project which evolved into my personal website.
  • The White Log (inactive) - creating notes on living a meaningful life, co-created with Silvia Bastos.

Articles

I write about different topics. You can find some of my pieces here, grouped in some kind of order:

  • Experiences - experiences I hosted / co-created
  • Non-negotiable - exploring commitments, habits, intentional living
  • Community - weaving communities
  • Wizard - magick stuffs
  • Self-Reliance - learning survival stuff
  • Journaling - good, old-fashioned pen and paper

Podcasts

  • Enspiral Podcast

Documentation in Twitter Threads

  • Regenerative Village Builders Mastermind - live documentation of an 11-day process where 15 people created a 192 pages book encouraging moving towards regenerative way of living as a planetary goal.
  • Mycelium Network - live documentation of building a relational space to grow and weave the global regenerative network through meeting your individual needs.
  • Enspiral Handbook 2023 Update - live documentation of conducting a major update to Enspiral’s handbook.
  • Enspiral Europe Node Documentation - live documentation of creating a documentation for Enspiral Europe.
  • Radical Radish Online Course - a playful documentation of learning how to grow my own food.

Personal

  • Moonly Review - Every 🌑 and 🌕, I write a heartfelt electronic letter with what’s alive in me in this cycle.
  • Moonly Video - Every 🌑 I compile a short film compiling images from every day of the cycle.
  • Michal & Silvia / Honeyboom (inactive) - Youtube channel exploring tools and inspiration to help you build vibrant relationships

Technical Documentation

  • Publish from Obsidian to Github - Create and edit a Jekyll website in Obsidian. Publish to Github without friction. No need for coding experience.

(News)letters 💌

  • Moonly Reviews 🌑🌕 - a heartfelt electronic letter aligned with the Moon, sharing my personal story as it unfolds
  • Enspiral Newsletter (Internal & External) - updates from a network of people helping each other do meaningful work and notes from the field of the future of work and a new way of organising.
  • Sunday Insights (newsletter project in 2020) - weekly email with an insight, a prompt, a picture, and an idea worth spreading.

Food

  • Nomz - delicious and nutricious vegan, sugar free desserts.



“One of my favourite things about the Sunday Insights is that they give a window into your world. I love it that not only are you deep thinkers committed to the things that matter most in life, but that you are also committed to being guides on the journey. So grateful to be in satsanga.”
– Cathy Hutchison
